response.overview: “The pretend game” is something audiences will expect when they watch The Virgin And The Billionaire! Cindy Parks, who desperately needs to fund her mother’s kidney transplant, will do anything for money, including sleeping with a guy.  Cindy has never kissed any men or got involved in a one-night stand relationship before. Nikki Jenkins, her mother’s boss’ daughter, is the one forcing her to sleep with Charles Kane, the CEO of Kane Industry.
response.title: The Virgin and The Billionaire
